caption: The video tells the story of a female student who is reluctant to attend the class and complains about the content in class. A sudden power failure allowed the female students to escape from the class. The blackout was secretly staged by the girl's brother. The brother and sister bribed the gang leader from the hands of the local gang through rhetoric and finance, and obtained two work clothes. Dressed in overalls, the brother and sister take an elevator from the earth's underground to the earth's surface.
